definition: Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
Yangge opera, a rural form of theater

sentences.english: She loves singing, dancing, drawing and all other interesting things.
sentences.chinese: 整個人物的動作也很有趣，像是扭秧歌。

sentences.english: The eight immortals yangko, dragon-lion dance to the operating vitality.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌龍獅舞翩躚，營運活力賽八仙。

sentences.english: In Chapter Three, the transition of the cultural formation of the "Academism" Northeast YangGe is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析“學院派”東北秧歌的文化形態變遷。

sentences.english: During the Lantern Festival, people hang up colourful lanterns in their courtyards, play Yangko and set off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 燈節時，人們在庭院裏懸掛彩燈，扭秧歌並燃放煙花。

sentences.english: Another well-known folk dance is the Yangge, which is often performed on special occasions.
sentences.chinese: 另外著名的民族舞蹈是秧歌，常常在節日慶典上表演。

sentences.english: That, without too much exaggeration, was part of the significance of the Yangko.
sentences.chinese: 可以毫不誇張地說，秧歌的意義也正在於此。

sentences.english: Common people enter it with the yangko team and enjoy all kinds of performances.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆隨着秧歌隊進入其內，觀賞各種秧歌表演。

sentences.english: Common people enter it with the yangko team and enjoy all kinds of performances.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆隨着秧歌隊進入其內，觀賞各種秧歌表演。

sentences.english: Huang Ying, the deputy leader of the Yangko troupe had a special affection for Yangko.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌隊副隊長黃英對秧歌情有獨鍾。

sentences.english: Huang Ying, the deputy leader of the Yangko troupe had a special affection for Yangko.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌隊副隊長黃英對秧歌情有獨鍾。

sentences.english: Yang-ge dancing is a necessity of celebrating holidays.
sentences.chinese: 扭秧歌是歡度節日的必備節目。

sentences.english: Another well-known folk dance is the Yangge.
sentences.chinese: 另一種著名的民間舞蹈是秧歌。

sentences.english: The existence of Yangge increases New year's atmosphere and enriches people's life.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌的存在增加了年味和豐富了人們的生活。

sentences.english: Changlidi Yangko has a distinct character from form to content.
sentences.chinese: 昌黎地秧歌從形式到內容，都有其明顯個性。

sentences.english: ChapterV : Cultural meaning of Wushan Yangko.
sentences.chinese: 第五章爲武山秧歌的文化內涵。

sentences.english: Yangge dance is a form of Chinese folk dance originating from the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秧歌舞是一種源自宋朝的中國民間舞蹈。

definition: festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
waist drum/waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in Inner Mongolia
genre of folk song with accompaniment of bamboo clappers
stilts/walking on stilts as component of folk dance
Yangge opera, a rural form of theater
Qinqiang, an opera style popular in northwest China, possibly originating in Ming dynasty folk music/Shaanxi opera
